title: For ‘Fleishman Is in Trouble,’ Claire Danes and Jesse Eisenberg Say I Do
description: The actors share a doomed union in this new FX series. In a joint interview, they discuss their own marriages and how it felt to depict such a contentious one.
dc:creator: Alexis Soloski
media:credit: Thea Traff for The New York Times
media:description: In “Fleishman Is in Trouble,” Claire Danes and Jesse Eisenberg play two halves of a splintered couple.
